DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the effects of HPIPC for the treatment of symptoms of PAD
DOC.brief_title: Effect of HPIPC for the Treatment of Ischemic Ulcers in Subjects With PAD
DOC.criteria: Intermittent claudication >6mo Ischemic ulceration or ulcer of mixed (venous) etiology ABI < 0.7 Ambulatory Able to comply Gangrene M.I. within 6mo Inability to walk Wound infection Systemic corticosteroids HBO, Apligraf, Dermagraft within 6mo Falsely elevated ankle to brachial index (ABI) Inflammatory condition affecting healing
